ygData.subject: Configure Heritrix 3.1.0 o crawl all the elements in a web site
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi I m using Heritrix 3.1.0 and crawling some seeds daily. I m using REST API commands and I have added these commands to crontab in ubuntu to do the crawling
